original_text: For you have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried my rich treasures into your temples.
korean_text: 곧 너희가 내 은과 금을 빼앗고 나의 진기한 보물을 너희 신전으로 가져갔으며

sentences.original_text: For you have taken my silver and my gold
and have carried my rich treasures into your temples.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 귀한 보물들을 너희 신전으로 가져왔다
